item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 15th July
item.description:
Cut back hedges that have grown into single C/W and cut down tree tops over hanging - approx 700m - close lane - 28 Days (Overgrown Hedge)

item.title: Water running down Langley Lane, 15th July
item.description:
100m from Lower Langley Farm going towards Winchcombe water is constantly running onto road. Water is from spring. Severn Trent have tested water and it’s not a mains leak. Very treacherous in the winter months

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Langley Road, Winchcombe, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same
